p: Primary data analysis was performed with Torrent Suite™ Software v4.0 with automated secondary analysis using Ion Reporter™ Software v4.0. Further analysis was done using a variety of computer packages including Past3, XLstat, NCSS 2007, “R” and NCSS 2010. Alpha diversity analysis was conducted using QIIME pipeline (version 1.8.0) (QIIME, 2016). Significance reported for any analysis is defined as p < 0.05.
